    • productSales

      @Query(value="select name, count(*) from order_product op join orders ord on op.order_id = ord.order_id join product p on op.product_id = p.product_id where order_date >= ?1 and order_date <= ?2 group by name", nativeQuery=true) List<Map<String,Object>> productSales(LocalDate start, LocalDate end)
      Gets quantity sold for products in the database
      Parameters:
      start - Date to start query
      end - Date to end query
      Returns:
      JSON object containing product and its quantity sold

    • commonPairings

      @Query(value="SELECT p1.name AS product1, p2.name AS product2, COUNT(DISTINCT op1.order_id) AS combination_count FROM order_product AS op1 JOIN order_product AS op2 ON op1.order_id = op2.order_id AND op1.product_id < op2.product_id JOIN orders AS o ON op1.order_id = o.order_id JOIN product AS p1 ON op1.product_id = p1.product_id JOIN product AS p2 ON op2.product_id = p2.product_id WHERE o.order_date >= ?1 AND o.order_date <= ?2 GROUP BY p1.name, p2.name ORDER BY combination_count desc", nativeQuery=true) List<Map<String,Object>> commonPairings(LocalDate start, LocalDate end)
      Gets common pairings between two dates for items sold together
      Parameters:
      start - Date to start query
      end - Date to end query
      Returns:
      JSON object containing two products, and their quantity sold together
